001package org.consensusj.bitcoin.json.pojo;
002
003import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonCreator;
004import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonProperty;
005import org.bitcoinj.base.Address;
006import org.bitcoinj.base.Coin;
007import org.bitcoinj.base.Sha256Hash;
008
009import java.time.Instant;
010import java.util.ArrayList;
011import java.util.List;
012
013/**
014 * Detailed information about an in-wallet transaction (from gettransaction RPC)
015 */
016public class WalletTransactionInfo {
017    private final Coin amount;
018    private final Coin fee;
019    private final int confirmations;
020    private final Sha256Hash blockhash;
021    private final int blockindex;
022    private final Instant blocktime;
023    private final Sha256Hash txid;
024    private final WalletConflictList walletconflicts;
025    private final Instant time;
026    private final Instant timereceived;
027    private final String bip125Replaceable;
028    private final DetailList details;
029    private final String hex;
030    private final RawTransactionInfo decoded;
031
032    @JsonCreator
033    public WalletTransactionInfo(@JsonProperty("amount")            Coin amount,
034                                 @JsonProperty("fee")               Coin fee,
035                                 @JsonProperty("confirmations")     int confirmations,
036                                 @JsonProperty("blockhash")         Sha256Hash blockhash,
037                                 @JsonProperty("blockindex")        int blockindex,
038                                 @JsonProperty("blocktime")         long blocktime,
039                                 @JsonProperty("txid")              Sha256Hash txid,
040                                 @JsonProperty("walletconflicts")   WalletConflictList walletconflicts,
041                                 @JsonProperty("time")              long time,
042                                 @JsonProperty("timereceived")      long timereceived,
043                                 @JsonProperty("bip125-replaceable") String bip125Replaceable,
044                                 @JsonProperty("details")           DetailList details,
045                                 @JsonProperty("hex")               String hex,
046                                 @JsonProperty("decoded")           RawTransactionInfo decoded) {
047        this.amount = amount;
048        this.fee = fee;
049        this.confirmations = confirmations;
050        this.blockhash = blockhash;
051        this.blockindex = blockindex;
052        this.blocktime = Instant.ofEpochSecond(blocktime);
053        this.txid = txid;
054        this.walletconflicts = walletconflicts;
055        this.time = Instant.ofEpochSecond(time);
056        this.timereceived = Instant.ofEpochSecond(timereceived);
057        this.bip125Replaceable = bip125Replaceable;
058        this.details = details;
059        this.hex = hex;
060        this.decoded = decoded;
061    }
062
063    public Coin getAmount() {
064        return amount;
065    }
066
067    public Coin getFee() {
068        return fee;
069    }
070
071    public int getConfirmations() {
072        return confirmations;
073    }
074
075    public Sha256Hash getBlockhash() {
076        return blockhash;
077    }
078
079    public int getBlockindex() {
080        return blockindex;
081    }
082
083    public Instant getBlocktime() {
084        return blocktime;
085    }
086
087    public Sha256Hash getTxid() {
088        return txid;
089    }
090
091    public List<Sha256Hash> getWalletconflicts() {
092        return walletconflicts;
093    }
094
095    public Instant getTime() {
096        return time;
097    }
098
099    public Instant getTimereceived() {
100        return timereceived;
101    }
102
103    public List<Detail> getDetails() {
104        return details;
105    }
106
107    public String getHex() {
108        return hex;
109    }
110
111    public RawTransactionInfo getDecoded() {
112        return decoded;
113    }
114
115    public static class WalletConflictList extends ArrayList<Sha256Hash> {
116    }
117
118    public static class DetailList extends ArrayList<Detail> {
119    }
120
121    public static class Detail {
122        private final String account;
123        private final Address address;
124        private final String category;
125        private final Coin amount;
126        private final String label;
127        private final int vout;
128        private final Coin fee;
129
130        public Detail(@JsonProperty("account")  String account,
131                      @JsonProperty("address")  Address address,
132                      @JsonProperty("category") String category,
133                      @JsonProperty("amount")   Coin amount,
134                      @JsonProperty("label")    String label,
135                      @JsonProperty("vout")     int vout,
136                      @JsonProperty("fee")      Coin fee) {
137            this.account = account;
138            this.address = address;
139            this.category = category;
140            this.amount = amount;
141            this.label = label;
142            this.vout = vout;
143            this.fee = fee;
144        }
145
146        public String getAccount() {
147            return account;
148        }
149
150        public Address getAddress() {
151            return address;
152        }
153
154        public String getCategory() {
155            return category;
156        }
157
158        public Coin getAmount() {
159            return amount;
160        }
161
162        public int getVout() {
163            return vout;
164        }
165
166        public Coin getFee() {
167            return fee;
168        }
169    }
170}
